text:
Hi All,

I’m trying to figure out if there’s a way to trigger a notification from a click event (button) [current tier - Marketing Pro]

See attached. This is in product after a user completes their trial they receive a prompt to upgrade. If the user clicks on the button “Contact sales for a quote” I want it to simply log the event of the user and then send a notification to the team.

Is this possible? Where do I start?
